title: The Well-Endowed Edition
description:
Felix Salmon of Fusion, Slate Moneybox columnist Jordan Weissmann, and political-risk consultant Anna Szymanski discuss:
Corruption in Saudi Arabia
Wilbur Ross
University endowments and the Paradise Papers
In Slate Plus: Stealing the World Cup from Qatar.
If you’d like to leave us a voicemail for our December call-in show, call (347) 960-6314.
Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter:@felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @JHWeissmann
Podcast production by Daniel Schroeder.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
